maya/beastmayaplugin/src/vertextarget.cpp

#include "vertextarget.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastframebufferwrapper.h"
#include "beastwrappers/beastjobwrapper.h"
#include "mayautils.h"
#include <sstream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <maya/MColorArray.h>
#include <maya/MDagPath.h>
#include <maya/MFnDagNode.h>
#include <maya/MFnMesh.h>
#include <maya/MItMeshPolygon.h>
#include <maya/MUintArray.h>

namespace beastmaya {

VertexEntity::VertexEntity(const MObject& instance, const MObject& entity) :
Entity(instance,entity) { }

void VertexEntity::exportEntity(BeastTarget& target) {
        m_targetEntity = target.addInstance(*getBeastInstance());
}

void VertexEntity::importEntity(const std::wstring& targetName, BeastTarget& target, const std::vector<PassPtr>& passes) {
        MStatus res;
        MFnDagNode instance(getMayaInstance(), &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        MDagPath path;
        instance.getPath(path);
        res = path.extendToShape();
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        MFnMesh mesh(path, &res);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
        MStringArray colorSetNames;
        res = mesh.getColorSetNames(colorSetNames);
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);

        MUintArray instanceNumberArray;
        res = instanceNumberArray.append(path.instanceNumber());
        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);

        for(auto it = begin(passes); it != end(passes); ++it) {
                BeastFramebufferPtr vertexBuffer = target.getVertexbuffer((*it)->getBeastPass(), *getBeastTargetEntity());
                int width, height, channelCount;
                vertexBuffer->getResolution(width, height);
                vertexBuffer->getChannelCount(channelCount);
                assert(height == 1 && "Unexpected vertex buffer size");
                std::vector<float> buffer;
                vertexBuffer->readRegionHDR(0, 0, width, height, ILB_CS_ALL, buffer);

                MItMeshPolygon polygonIterator(mesh.object(), &res);
                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);

                MIntArray faceList;
                MIntArray vertexList;
                int globalFaceVertexIndex = 0;

                for (int faceIndex=0; !polygonIterator.isDone(); polygonIterator.next(), ++faceIndex) {

                        MIntArray polygonVertexList;
                        polygonIterator.getVertices(polygonVertexList);

                        int numVertices = polygonVertexList.length();

                        for (int localFaceVertexIndex = 0; localFaceVertexIndex < numVertices; ++localFaceVertexIndex, ++globalFaceVertexIndex) {

                                // Save face and vertex indices, which is needed below
                                // for assigning the colors to the mesh
                                faceList.append(faceIndex);
                                vertexList.append(polygonVertexList[localFaceVertexIndex]);
                        }
                }

                assert(faceList.length() == width * height && "Unexpected number of vertices on mesh");

                int nbrOfColorSets = (int)ceilf((float)(channelCount-1)/3.0f);

                unsigned int channelOffset = 0;

                for(int colorSetIndex = 0 ; colorSetIndex < nbrOfColorSets; ++colorSetIndex) {
                
                        std::wstringstream colorSetName;
                        colorSetName << targetName << L"_" << (*it)->getPassName() << L"_" << colorSetIndex;

                        std::wstring colorSetNameShort = colorSetName.str();

                        // Append instance number... 
                        colorSetName << L"(" << path.instanceNumber() << L")";
                
                        MString colorSetNameResult = colorSetNameShort.c_str();
                        if(!inStringArray(colorSetName.str().c_str(), colorSetNames)) {         
                                res = mesh.createColorSet(colorSetNameResult, NULL, &instanceNumberArray);
                                CHECK_MSTATUS(res);     
                        } else {
                                // Reusing color set, change color set name to include instance number
                                colorSetNameResult = colorSetName.str().c_str();
                        }

                        MColorArray vertexColors;
                        vertexColors.setLength(faceList.length());
                        unsigned int numVertexColors = vertexColors.length();

                        unsigned int bufferOffset = 0;

                        for(unsigned int vxColIndex = 0; vxColIndex < numVertexColors; ++vxColIndex) {
                                vertexColors.set(MColor(buffer[channelOffset + bufferOffset], buffer[channelOffset + bufferOffset + 1], buffer[channelOffset + bufferOffset + 2], 1.0f), vxColIndex);
                                bufferOffset += channelCount;
                        }

                        res = mesh.setCurrentColorSetName(colorSetNameResult);
                        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
                        res = mesh.setFaceVertexColors(vertexColors, faceList, vertexList);
                        CHECK_MSTATUS(res);
                        channelOffset += 3;
                }
        }
}

VertexTarget::VertexTarget(const MObject& targetNode) : Target(targetNode) {

}

void VertexTarget::exportTarget(BeastJob& job) {
        BeastTargetPtr target = job.createVertexTarget(getGuid().c_str());
        setBeastTarget(target);

        if(isWorldSpaceFilterEnabled()) {
                for(auto it = begin(getWorldSpaceFilterSettings()); it != end(getWorldSpaceFilterSettings()); ++it) {
                        const FilterSettings& settings = it->second;
                        getBeastTarget().enableWorldSpaceFilter(it->first);
                        getBeastTarget().setWorldSpaceFilterSize(it->first, settings.size);
                        getBeastTarget().setWorldSpaceFilterNormalDeviation(it->first, settings.normalDev);
                }
        }

        for(auto it = begin(m_entities); it != end(m_entities); ++it) {
                (*it)->exportEntity(getBeastTarget());
        }

        for(auto passIt = begin(m_passes); passIt != end(m_passes); ++passIt) {
                (*passIt)->exportPass(job, getBeastTarget());
                for(auto entityIt = begin(m_entities); entityIt != end(m_entities); ++entityIt) {
                        // Add entity to pass
                        (*passIt)->addEntity(*(*entityIt)->getBeastTargetEntity());
                }
        }
}

void VertexTarget::addEntity(VertexEntityPtr& entity) {
        m_entities.push_back(entity);
}

void VertexTarget::addPass(PassPtr& pass) {
        m_passes.push_back(pass);
}

void VertexTarget::importTarget() {
        for(auto it = begin(m_entities); it != end(m_entities); ++it) {
                (*it)->importEntity(getTargetName(), getBeastTarget(), m_passes);
        }
}

}
